snippet.title: Cyberpunk 2077 — Update 2.0 Date Reveal
snippet.description:
THE MOMENT YOU'VE BEEN WAITING FOR

Update 2.0 for Cyberpunk 2077 is coming on September 21!

Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty arrives on September 26th on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC. Pre-order now: https://www.cyberpunk.net/buy 

Learn more about #Cyberpunk2077 and #PhantomLiberty at https://www.cyberpunk.net
